segments.text: I observe the woman at the sink, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are pulled back from the window above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight streams in, highlighting the garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the walkway, everything looks serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the faucet runs endlessly into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water soaks the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle spreads across the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool reaches for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is tense, the stool tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, palm open in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big accident any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's ignorance of it all is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast between the calm outside and turmoil within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
